title: varfish-server case query settings
description: Single case query settings for varfish-server

database.title: The transcript database to use
database.description: You can select between either using refseq or ensembl transcripts, defaults to refseq

effects.title: The effects schema
effects.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

exac_enabled.title: Whether to enable ExAC frequency filter
exac_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable ExAC frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal allele frequency in ExAC
anyOf.description: When ``exac_enabled`` then only variants with at an allele frequency of ``exac_frequency`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heterozygous state count in ExAC
anyOf.description: When ``exac_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``exac_heterozygous`` variants in heterozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homozygous state count in ExAC
anyOf.description: When ``exac_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``exac_homozygous`` variants in homozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal hemizygous state count in ExAC
anyOf.description: When ``exac_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``exac_hemizygous`` variants in hemizygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

gnomad_exomes_enabled.title: Whether to enable gnomAD exomes frequency filter
gnomad_exomes_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable gnomAD exomes frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal allele frequency in gnomAD exomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_exomes_enabled`` then only variants with at an allele frequency of ``gnomad_exomes_frequency`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heterozygous state count in gnomAD exomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_exomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_exomes_heterozygous`` variants in heterozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homozygous state count in gnomAD exomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_exomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_exomes_homozygous`` variants in homozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal hemizygous state count in gnomAD exomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_exomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_exomes_hemizygous`` variants in hemizygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

gnomad_genomes_enabled.title: Whether to enable gnomAD genomes frequency filter
gnomad_genomes_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable gnomAD genomes frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal allele frequency in gnomAD genomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at an allele frequency of ``gnomad_genomes_frequency`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heterozygous state count in gnomAD genomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_genomes_heterozygous`` variants in heterozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homozygous state count in gnomAD genomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_genomes_homozygous`` variants in homozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal hemizygous state count in gnomAD genomes
anyOf.description: When ``gnomad_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``gnomad_genomes_hemizygous`` variants in hemizygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

thousand_genomes_enabled.title: Whether to enable thousand genomes frequency filter
thousand_genomes_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable thousand genomes frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal allele frequency in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``thousand_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at an allele frequency of ``thousand_genomes_frequency`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heterozygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``thousand_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``thousand_genomes_heterozygous`` variants in heterozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homozygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``thousand_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``thousand_genomes_homozygous`` variants in homozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal hemizygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``thousand_genomes_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``thousand_genomes_hemizygous`` variants in hemizygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

inhouse_enabled.title: Whether to enable thousand genomes frequency filter
inhouse_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable in-house frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal carrier count in in-house database
anyOf.description: When ``inhouse_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``inhouse_carriers`` carriers in the in-house database will pass the filter, use ``null``, for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heterozygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``inhouse_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``inhouse_heterozygous`` variants in heterozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homozygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``inhouse_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``inhouse_homozygous`` variants in homozygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal hemizygous state count in thousand genomes
anyOf.description: When ``inhouse_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``inhouse_hemizygous`` variants in hemizygous state will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

mtdb_enabled.title: Whether to enable mtdb frequency filter
mtdb_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable mtdb frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal number/absolute frequency of carriers in mtdb
anyOf.description: When ``mtdb_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``mtdb_count`` carriers will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal relative frequencey of carriers in mtdb
anyOf.description: When ``mtdb_enabled`` then only variants with a fraction (between 0 and 0.05) of at most ``mtdb_frequency``, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

helixmtdb_enabled.title: Whether to enable helixmtdb frequency filter
helixmtdb_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable helixmtdb frequency filter

anyOf.title: Maximal carrier frequency in helixmtdb
anyOf.description: When ``helixmtdb_enabled`` then only variants with at a carrier frequency of ``helixmtdb_frequency`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal heteroplasmy frequency in helixmtdb
anyOf.description: When ``helixmtdb_enabled`` then only variants with at number of carriers in heteroplasmic state of ``helixmtdb_het_count`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: Maximal homoplasmy frequency in helixmtdb
anyOf.description: When ``helixmtdb_enabled`` then only variants with at number of carriers in homoplasmic state of ``helixmtdb_hom_count`` or below will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

mitomap_enabled.title: Whether to enable the mitomap carrier filter
mitomap_enabled.description: Set to ``true`` to enable mitomap carrier filter

anyOf.title: Maximal number of carriers in mtDB
anyOf.description: When ``mitomap_enabled`` then only variants with at most ``mitomap_count`` carriers will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not applying threshold

anyOf.title: The mitomap_frequency schema
anyOf.description: When ``mitomap_enabled`` then only variants with a relative frequency (between 0 and 1) will pass the filter, use ``null`` for not enabling threshold

transcripts_coding.title: Include variants on coding transcripts
transcripts_coding.description: When enabled then variants whose most pathogenic effect is on a coding transcripts

transcripts_noncoding.title: Include variants on non-coding transcripts
transcripts_noncoding.description: When enabled then variants whose most pathogenic effect is on a non-coding transcripts

var_type_snv.title: Include SNV variants
var_type_snv.description: When set to ``true`` then include singlenucleotide variants in the results

var_type_indel.title: Include indel variants
var_type_indel.description: When set to ``true`` then include insertion and deletion variants (e.g., ``CGA>C`` and ``C>CGA``) in the results

var_type_mnv.title: Include MVN variants
var_type_mnv.description: When set to ``true`` then include multinucleotide variants (e.g., ``CG>TT``) in the results

anyOf.title: The largest distance to exons
anyOf.description: When set then only variants with at most ``max_exon_dist`` to the next exon are included, leave unset to not filter based on this

flag_simple_empty.title: Include variants marked with no flag
flag_simple_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have no simple flag set are included in the result

flag_bookmarked.title: Include variants marked with "bookmarked" flag
flag_bookmarked.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "bookmarked" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_incidental.title: Include variants marked with "incidental" flag
flag_incidental.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "incidental" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_candidate.title: Include variants marked with "candidate" flag
flag_candidate.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "candidate" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_doesnt_segregate.title: Include variants marked with "does not segregate" flag
flag_doesnt_segregate.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "does not segregate" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_final_causative.title: Include variants marked with "final report" flag
flag_final_causative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "final report" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_for_validation.title: Include variants marked with "for validation" flag
flag_for_validation.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "for validation" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_no_disease_association.title: Include variants marked with "no disease association" flag
flag_no_disease_association.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "no disease association" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_segregates.title: Include variants marked with "segregates" flag
flag_segregates.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "segregates" simple flag set are included in the result

flag_molecular_empty.title: Include variants that have the "molecular" flag unset
flag_molecular_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "molecular" flag unset are included in the result

flag_molecular_negative.title: Include variants marked with "molecular" flag set to "negative"
flag_molecular_negative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "molecular" flag set to "negative" are included in the result

flag_molecular_positive.title: Include variants marked with "molecular" flag set to "positive"
flag_molecular_positive.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "molecular" flag set to "positive" are included in the result

flag_molecular_uncertain.title: Include variants marked with "molecular" flag set to "uncertain"
flag_molecular_uncertain.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "molecular" flag set to "uncertain" are included in the result

flag_phenotype_match_empty.title: Include variants that have the "phenotype match" flag unset
flag_phenotype_match_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "phenotype match" flag unset are included in the result

flag_phenotype_match_negative.title: Include variants marked with "phenotype match" flag set to "negative"
flag_phenotype_match_negative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "phenotype match" flag set to "negative" are included in the result

flag_phenotype_match_positive.title: Include variants marked with "phenotype match" flag set to "positive"
flag_phenotype_match_positive.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "phenotype match" flag set to "positive" are included in the result

flag_phenotype_match_uncertain.title: Include variants marked with "phenotype match" flag set to "uncertain"
flag_phenotype_match_uncertain.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "phenotype match" flag set to "uncertain" are included in the result

flag_summary_empty.title: Include variants that have the "summary" flag unset
flag_summary_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "summary" flag unset are included in the result

flag_summary_negative.title: Include variants marked with "summary" flag set to "negative"
flag_summary_negative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "summary" flag set to "negative" are included in the result

flag_summary_positive.title: Include variants marked with "summary" flag set to "positive"
flag_summary_positive.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "summary" flag set to "positive" are included in the result

flag_summary_uncertain.title: Include variants marked with "summary" flag set to "uncertain"
flag_summary_uncertain.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "summary" flag set to "uncertain" are included in the result

flag_validation_empty.title: Include variants that have the "validation" flag unset
flag_validation_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "validation" flag unset are included in the result

flag_validation_negative.title: Include variants marked with "validation" flag set to "negative"
flag_validation_negative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "validation" flag set to "negative" are included in the result

flag_validation_positive.title: Include variants marked with "validation" flag set to "positive"
flag_validation_positive.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "validation" flag set to "positive" are included in the result

flag_validation_uncertain.title: Include variants marked with "validation" flag set to "uncertain"
flag_validation_uncertain.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "validation" flag set to "uncertain" are included in the result

flag_visual_empty.title: Include variants that have the "visual" flag unset
flag_visual_empty.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "visual" flag unset are included in the result

flag_visual_negative.title: Include variants marked with "visual" flag set to "negative"
flag_visual_negative.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "visual" flag set to "negative" are included in the result

flag_visual_positive.title: Include variants marked with "visual" flag set to "positive"
flag_visual_positive.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "visual" flag set to "positive" are included in the result

flag_visual_uncertain.title: Include variants marked with "visual" flag set to "uncertain"
flag_visual_uncertain.description: When set (default) then variants that have the "visual" flag set to "uncertain" are included in the result

gene_allowlist.title: List of genes to restrict the resulting variants to
gene_allowlist.description: List of gene symbols, entrez gene identifiers, or ENSEMBL gene identifiers to limit variants for (for a variant affecting multiple genes, the combinations of the variants and genes will be reported independently), leave empty to apply no such filter

gene_blocklist.title: List of genes to exclude from the result
gene_blocklist.description: List of gene symbols, entrez gene identifiers, or ENSEMBL gene identifiers to exclude variants for (for a variant affecting multiple genes, the combinations of the variants and genes will be reported independently), leave empty to apply no such filter

require_in_clinvar.title: Restrict variants to those in local copy of Clinvar
require_in_clinvar.description: Set to true to restrict variants to those present in local copy of Clinvar

clinvar_paranoid_mode.title: Weaken weight of 'criteria provided' in variant assessment
clinvar_paranoid_mode.description: When set, then variant assessments with and without assertion are interpreted as equally important. By default, they are not those with assessment override the others.

clinvar_include_benign.title: Whether to include variants marked as benign in local Clinvar copy if ``require_in_clinvar``
clinvar_include_benign.description: Set to true (default) to make variants pass the filter that are marked as benign in the local Clinvar copy, set to false to make them not pass the filter

clinvar_include_pathogenic.title: Whether to include variants marked as pathogenic in local Clinvar copy if ``require_in_clinvar``
clinvar_include_pathogenic.description: Set to true (default) to make variants pass the filter that are marked as pathogenic in the local Clinvar copy, set to false to make them not pass the filter

clinvar_include_likely_benign.title: Whether to include variants marked as likely benign in local Clinvar copy if ``require_in_clinvar``
clinvar_include_likely_benign.description: Set to true (default) to make variants pass the filter that are marked as likely benign in the local Clinvar copy, set to false to make them not pass the filter

clinvar_include_likely_pathogenic.title: Whether to include variants marked as likely pathogenic in local Clinvar copy if ``require_in_clinvar``
clinvar_include_likely_pathogenic.description: Set to true (default) to make variants pass the filter that are marked as likely pathogenic in the local Clinvar copy, set to false to make them not pass the filter

clinvar_include_uncertain_significance.title: Whether to include variants marked as unknown certificance in local Clinvar copy if ``require_in_clinvar``
clinvar_include_uncertain_significance.description: Set to true (default) to make variants pass the filter that are marked as of unknown significance in the local Clinvar copy, set to false to make them not pass the filter

genomic_region.title: List of genomic regions to limit the query to
genomic_region.description: When set thenonly variants contained in or overlapping with the given genomic regions pass the filter, leave empty to apply no region filter

patho_enabled.title: Enable pathogenicity annotation
patho_enabled.description: Set to true to enable annotation with pathogenicity, requires setting a value for ``patho_score``

anyOf.title: The pathogenicity score to use for annotating variants
anyOf.description: Select pathogenicity score to use if ``patho_enabled``. Must be one of the pathogenicity scores enabled in the VarFish server instance (depends on the installation)

anyOf.title: The phenotype-based prioritization algorithm to use for priorizing variants
anyOf.description: Select algorithm to use if ``prio_enabled``. Must be one of the algorithms enabled in the VarFish server instance (depends on the installation)

anyOf.title: The prio_hpo_terms schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

prio_gm.title: The prio_gm schema
prio_gm.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

anyOf.title: Enable and select the biallelic recessive inheritance filter
anyOf.description: Use "compound-recessive" to restrict to variants compatible with compound recessive mode of inheritance and "recessive" to restrict to compatibility with either compound and homozygous recessive mode of inheritance. Use ``recessive_index`` to select the index for recessive inheritance

anyOf.title: Select the recessive index
anyOf.description: Set to the identifier of the recessive index

quality.title: Quality filter threshold
quality.description: Set quality thresholds for each individual. The key are the individual names and the values follows the defined schema from below

dp_het.title: Minimal total depth of coverage for heterozygous variants
dp_het.description: If set then exclude variants with lower total depth of coverage in sample's genotype call for heterozygous variants

dp_hom.title: Minimal total depth coverage for homozygous and hemizygous variants
dp_hom.description: If set then exclude variants with lower total depth of coverage in sample's genotype call for homozygous variants

ab.title: Minimal allelic balance for heterozygous variants
ab.description: If set then exclude variants with lower allelic balance in sample's genotype call

gq.title: Minimal genotype call quality
gq.description: If set then exclude variants with lower genotype quality in sample's genotype call

ad.title: Minimal number of read in alternative allele
ad.description: If set then exclude variants with lower depth of coverage on alternate allele in sample's genotype call

anyOf.title: Maximal alternate allele depth of coverage
anyOf.description: If set then exclude variants with higher depth of coverage on alternate allele in sample's genotype call

fail.title: Action to perform when genotype filter threshold is not passed
fail.description: Actions: ignore: ignore failure, drop-variant: drop whole variant (if ONE genotype in the variant fails filter), no-call: interpret as no-call

genotype.title: Genotype filter settings
genotype.description: Set genotype filter for each individual, must be given for each individual in query with genotype data
